name: .MTD File Extension
summary: Learn about .MTD files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: An MTD file is a sheet music file used by Musicnotes Viewer, a web browser plug-in used for viewing, purchasing, printing, and listening to digital sheet music. It contains voice, guitar, and piano tablature as well as lyrics. MTD files are used to download and share online tablature.

content: Musicnotes software is also available in the Suite edition, which includes Musicnotes Player, Musicnotes Viewer, and Musicnotes Guitar Guru.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
